body_html:
Sorry, missed this.
I agree with @mrry that this should be a bazel test, as that is our ground truth.
We should add a BUILD file under contrib/cmake, and have a py_test for this in that BUILD file. It will be picked up by our contrib builds automatically.

body:
Sorry, missed this.
I agree with @mrry that this should be a bazel test, as that is our ground truth.
We should add a BUILD file under contrib/cmake, and have a py_test for this in that BUILD file. It will be picked up by our contrib builds automatically.
